AD_REPLICATION.NAME: POS-Store
AD_REPLICATION.DESCRIPTION: Store is a remote POS - Can only enter Trx for the Store - not for HQ
AD_REPLICATION.HELP: 1) Set up everything and test in in central location (transaction, migration, etc.) 2) Export the database and import at the store location(s) 3) Run the Replication from the central location. That sets up the remote store(s) - ID Range, etc
